subject: Disc Jockeys
lead_paragraph: After Rony Seikaly's professional basketball career was up, he started to seriously pursue his passion of music. Now, the former N.B.A. center is an up-and-coming D.J. working the mixer at dance clubs around the world.
snippet: After Rony Seikaly's professional basketball career was up, he started to seriously pursue his passion of music. Now, the former N.B.A. center is an up-and-coming D.J. working the mixer at dance clubs around the world.
